content.p: We are a major international centre for energy research, with a reputation for excellence across a broad range of technology-based activities. Our University of Nottingham Energy Institute unites energy research across a range of disciplines, bringing together over 150 academics with an impressive portfolio of energy research, development and demonstration projects worth over £60m – funded by government, industry and the EU. Download our Energy Capabilities document, including an A-Z of energy expertise. Local businesses can access funded support for energy projects. Visit Energy for Business.
